ingredients.item: 300g essential Waitrose Long Grain Rice Easy Cook
300g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic 20 British Beef Meatballs
1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Brown Onion, sliced
250g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic Chestnut Mushrooms, sliced
1 tbsp Waitrose Duchy Organic Wholegrain Mustard With Honey

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water according to pack instructions, adding the spinach for the last minute until wilted. Then drain.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan, and fry the meatballs and onion for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook for a further 4-5 minutes.
Off the heat, stir in the mustard and cream, season and sprinkle over the chives, if using. Serve with the rice.
